sentences.en: British officers and Recon squads have their camouflage detection increased marginally.
sentences.cn: 英军指挥官和侦查小组反伪装距离略微增加.

sentences.en: But they can only marginally reduce, not eliminate the hazards.
sentences.cn: 但这也只是在一定程度上减少了, 而不是消除了危险性.

sentences.en: Gina’s grades have improved marginally since last term.
sentences.cn: 从上学期开始吉娜的成绩略有提高。

sentences.en: IF THE car business is in meltdown, things are only marginally better for truck manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 如果汽车行业正处于崩溃阶段, 那么货车生产商的日子也好不到哪儿去.

sentences.en: Sales last year were marginally higher than in 1991.
sentences.cn: 去年的销售额比1991年略有增加。

sentences.en: Studies reveal that MBO positively affects the operational cash flow, but marginally on other financial indicators.
sentences.cn: 研究发现,MBO对经营性现金流产生了积极的正向作用, 但对其余财务指标的影响并不显著.

sentences.en: The features are only marginally significant at 95 % level on a statistical basis.
sentences.cn: 这些特征在95%水平时刚好在统计上是显著的.

sentences.en: The link was only marginally statistically significant.
sentences.cn: 这一联系仅仅是沾边有统计学的意义.

sentences.en: The new system is only marginally more efficient than the old one.
sentences.cn: 新系统的效率比旧系统只有略微提高。

sentences.en: These cameras have increased only marginally in value over the past decade.
sentences.cn: 在过去10年里，这些照相机的价格只是略有提高。

sentences.en: They now cost marginally more than they did last year.
sentences.cn: 他们现在并不比去年贵多少。

sentences.en: This may mean marginally more calorie expenditure each day.
sentences.cn: 这能让人体每天消耗更多热量.

sentences.en: This year's profits were marginally higher than last year's.
sentences.cn: 今年的利润比去年稍微高些.

sentences.en: Those, in the bureau words, who are " marginally attached to the labor force. "
sentences.cn: 用统计局的话来说, 这些人 “ 游荡在劳动力市场的边缘 ”.

sentences.en: Wehrmacht StuH 42 weapon does marginally increased area damage to infantry.
sentences.cn: 国防军闪电学42型突击榴弹炮对步兵的杀伤范围略增.

sentences.en: With less gold, the IMF would be marginally less secure, but still far from financial fragility.
sentences.cn: 减少黄金储备以后的IMF将相对不再可靠, 但还远非财力脆弱.

sentences.en: You can swap out some components and get a marginally heavier bike for under $ 3300.
sentences.cn: 你可以互换了一些部件和得到轻微加重自行车为$3300.

words.tran_cn: 边缘；利润，余裕；页边的空白
排斥；忽视；使处于社会边缘；使脱离社会发展进程
少量地；最低限度地；在栏外；在页边

trans.tran_en: not enough to make an important difference
